title: My First Test With WASM
subtitle: Setting up Emscripten and compiling to WASM
body:
Setting Up Emscripten

The first step in using WebAssembly is setting up Emscripten. This step took a very long time, because following the instructions on the WebAssembly site, there was an error everytime I tried. Eventually though, I started following the MDN instructions, which fixed my problem.

Writing

After that, all I had to do was write an "Application". I made a basic template for emscripten that makes the console fullscreen, and then made a console application.
